Bug List

Class horizon::AsmParser

The parser currently leaks a lot of memory. This needs to be fixed.

The parser (in Identify(), Resolve() and ToCore()) uses global variables, making it non-reentrant.

Member horizon::AstInsn::IsDecl ()
Should not be returning true. Would this break anything if fixed?

Member main (int argc, char **argv)

Should destroy all our contexts, but cannot due to a bug in LLVM, r103769
